page.title: Properties Panes
page.introduction:
The bottom right pane of the VCell document window contains an Object Properties tab that displays properties of any entity (e.g. species, reaction, structure) selected in the main View Pane of the document window.
Adjacent tabs provide more information about selected entities, the state of your biomodel, or other biomodels. Some of these panels may be hidden or visible at times, depending on their relevance to the selected entity.
page.operations:
Properties are specific to the item selected. The different properties displayed include:
Application Properties
Annotations
Database File Info
Membrane Flux
Molecules
Observables Properties
Parameters
Pathway Information
Problems (Issues)
Reactions
Reaction Rules Editor
Reaction Rules Kinetics
Species Properties
Stoichiometry
Structures
